# QRCode.js

This directory contains QRCode.js library by davidshimjs.

## License

MIT License (see LICENSE file)

## Source

- **Original Repository:** https://github.com/davidshimjs/qrcodejs
- **Author:** davidshimjs
- **Copyright:** (c) 2012 davidshimjs, (c) 2009 Kazuhiko Arase

## Files

- `qrcode.js` - Non-minified source (required by WordPress.org guidelines)
- `qrcode.min.js` - Minified version used in production
- `LICENSE` - MIT License text

## Compatibility

MIT License is GPL-compatible, making this library suitable for use in GPL WordPress plugins.

## Usage in ArBricks

This library is used client-side for the QR Code Generator Tool feature to generate QR codes in the browser without server-side processing.
